about_the_game:
A closer look at the state flags, and a little bit of basic information about the 50 US states, the District of Columbia and Puetro Rico. Features larger versions of all of the cards from the "US states" deck in-game.

The book is located in your "Solitaire: Learn the Flags!" install folder ("US flags book.pdf")
detailed_description:
A closer look at the state flags, and a little bit of basic information about the 50 US states, the District of Columbia and Puetro Rico. Features larger versions of all of the cards from the "US states" deck in-game.

The book is located in your "Solitaire: Learn the Flags!" install folder ("US flags book.pdf")

  • Additional Notes: Software to open PDF file
